h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
content: Below, you can find a guide to each Blood of the Iron Bull location within the early-game, the majority of which are in chests or found from defeating bosses.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md", within the section "Blood of the Iron Bull" and the sub-section "Blood of the Iron Bull Locations". The content is presented below:

Below, you can find a guide to each Blood of the Iron Bull location within the early-game, the majority of which are in chests or found from defeating bosses.
